Package model

Class GrayscaleImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractImage
      • model.GrayscaleImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Image
    public class GrayscaleImage
extends AbstractImage
    This class represents a Greyscale image.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GrayscaleImage​(int width, int height, int maxValue, Pixel[][] pixels)
      This constructor initialises the variables of the AbstractImage and this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void brighten​(int increment)
      This method loops through all pixels in the image, and increases their red, green, and blue values by the given increment parameter.
      void combineChannels​(Image[] channels)
      This method is used to combine the 3 channels R, G, B respectively.
      Image duplicate()
      This method creates a duplicate of the image values by the given decrement parameter.
      boolean isGrayscale()
      This method is used to check if the given image object is a greyscale image.
      Image load​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      This method is used to load other types of image formats apart from ppm.
      Image[] splitChannels()
      Splits the image into 3 channels.
